entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical object that sorts students into their respective houses at Hogwarts. It is mentioned in the text as 'T HE  SORTING  HAT 97'.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned in the text as talking to Harry through the hangings.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat. He is mentioned in the text as chewing on Ron's sheets.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned throughout the text as having various interactions with other characters.

entities.name: professor quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is a teacher at Hogwarts who wears a turban. He is mentioned in the text as being associated with Slytherin house.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts. It is mentioned in the text as a destination that Harry is being encouraged to transfer to.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is associated with Slytherin house. He is mentioned in the text as laughing at Harry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who has a hook nose and a cold laugh. He is mentioned in the text as being associated with Slytherin house.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by their interactions throughout the text.
There is no clear relationship between Harry and Scabbers in this text.
Professor Quirrell is associated with Slytherin house, as evidenced by the Sorting Hat's encouragement of Harry to transfer there.
Malfoy and Harry are enemies, as evidenced by Malfoy's laughter at Harry in the text.
Snape is associated with Slytherin house, as evidenced by his hook nose and cold laugh.
